sections.heading: ðŸ”¹ Introduction
content: The Hello World program is a traditional first step when learning any programming language. In JavaScript, it demonstrates how to output text using different methods.

sections.heading: ðŸ”¹ Using console.log()
content: The console.log() method is used to print messages to the browser console.

sections.heading: ðŸ”¹ Using alert()
content: The alert() method displays a popup alert with the specified message.

sections.heading: ðŸ”¹ Using document.write()
content: The document.write() method writes content directly into the HTML document.
